Package rl.sqltrainer.gui

Contains a Swing-based GUI for the SQL Trainer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SQLTrainerModel.ModelListener
    Observer interface for views which need to be informed about model state changes and log messages to be printed out.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Commands
    Defines constants for action commands.
    SQLTrainerController
    This controller is responsible for the execution of those commands, which change the state of the application.
    SQLTrainerFrame
    Frame to control the tool.
    SQLTrainerModel
    Adapter which hides application design details from the frame.
    SQLTrainerModel.DBTableModel
    Model, which provides JTable instances with the data they need.
    SQLTrainerModel.ModelEvent
    Object indicating to interested listeners what has changed in the model.
    SQLTrainerStarter
    Starts a tool to support SQL select statement training for DABAS-MD2.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SQLTrainerModel.EventType
    Classifies the events signaled to the view to inform about model changes.

Package rl.sqltrainer.gui Description

Contains a Swing-based GUI for the SQL Trainer. The design follows a model-view-controller approach, but with a loose coupling between model and view. Call the main method of class SQLTrainerStarter to start the application.
